title: #166: 10 COVID Trends Happening Around The World
description:
An amazing article from Makia Freeman was the inspiration for this episode on what is happening around the world with regard to the virus and the reaction to the virus by governments and society.

The intentional manipulation of statistics by the regulating agencies, mainstream media, and government officials is a clear sign that they are trying to create a narrative that is not authentic because otherwise, they would not need to play with the figures.

The lies are being exposed at a record pace, but even more lies are being created to take their place. The truth has no place in their COVID agenda which is why they are working so feverishly to try and stomp it out.
